name: Unanimated Woman's Random Token Adventure
description:
Help Unanimated Woman collect a random amount of tokens!!

By rolling a dice between levels, you decide how many tokens will need to be collect within a tight time limit.

Collect the orange tokens first, and collect the purple to unlock the flag and beat the level!

Coins can also be collect to roll for power ups, like speed or extra time!

Tokens are placed randomly, so no 2 runs will be the same.

(The same level with different token layouts)

Can you help Unanimated Woman collect all the tokens and maybe animate?

Well then play the game!

(Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022)

Music Used:
"Voxel Revolution" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
